channel.title: Server Down?
channel.description:
[size=25pt][b]It turns out it was my router this entire time...[/b][/size]
My RSCD Control Panels keeps on telling me my server is down. And I can't think of a reason for it. My server is indeed using my dedicated's database. Also, I've allowed the IP to access my database. And it's still giving me the error.
Also, when I try to connect to the website using my client, I get a timed out error. None of my settings are wrong, I've tested those many times.
So, I've come here for some help. Any ideas on what could be causing this. And if the server is in fact "down", how would I go about turning it back on?
[b]I think the problem could be that it is unable to load the IP that my that my server is given. 71.74.235.73:43594 So, that would explain the connection timouts. Does anyone know anyway that I could change or fix the error so that you can connect to my server through the IP of "71.74.235.73:43594"?[/b]
Error: [img]http://i190.photobucket.com/albums/z217/cloroxen/serverdown.jpg[/img]
Thanks to anyone who doesn't flame me... :/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2009, 07:00:44 pm[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Server Down?
item.dc:creator: @nate_o nate o
item.description:
@nate_o wrote:

[size=25pt]It turns out it was my router this entire time…[/size]

My RSCD Control Panels keeps on telling me my server is down. And I can’t think of a reason for it. My server is indeed using my dedicated’s database. Also, I’ve allowed the IP to access my database. And it’s still giving me the error.

Also, when I try to connect to the website using my client, I get a timed out error.
None of my settings are wrong, I’ve tested those many times.

So, I’ve come here for some help.
Any ideas on what could be causing this. And if the server is in fact “down”, how would I go about turning it back on?

I think the problem could be that it is unable to load the IP that my that my server is given.
71.74.235.73:43594
So, that would explain the connection timouts.
Does anyone know anyway that I could change or fix the error so that you can connect to my server through the IP of “71.74.235.73:43594”?

Error:

Thanks to anyone who doesn’t flame me… :/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2009, 07:00:44 pm[/size][hr]bump
